title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.33 - Verification algorithm timing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.33 - Verification algorithm timing

State Regulations

Verification may be user-initiated or triggered by a
specific significant event or events on the gaming device. To ensure complete
coverage, verification should be performed after each of the following
events: (a) gaming device power up; and
(b) new gaming device
installed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.33

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
